      @Transactional public boolean createClient(ClientDTO clientDTO) throws org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException, ClientInvalidDataException

      createClient in interface ClientService
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:

      ClientInvalidDataException - If the client data is invalid.
